he critical period of 
labor, delivery, and the 48 hours postpartum, 
when most maternal deaths and about half 
of newborn deaths occur. SMGL works to 
improve the existing health network within 
each district to ensure that women can receive 
quality facility-based care within 2 hours of 
the onset of labor or obstetric emergencies.
Coordinated and funded by a public-
private partnership,1 SMGL strives to improve 
access to, demand for, and the quality of basic 
and comprehensive Emergency Obst
